questionnaire.title: QUESTIONNAIRE ON BROWN & WILLIAMSON MAXWELL SEMINAR
questionnaire.purpose: The purpose of this questionnaire is to receive your personal response to the information presented by B&w at the 1985 Maxwell Seminar. We would appreciate your comments through completion of this brief questionnaire. Your signature is optional.

questions.question: The presentation clearly identified B&w's corporate strategy for the next 12 to 18 months.
Would you have need for additional financial information about B&w, BAtus and B.A.T.
Do you feel the answers to questions raised in the Q&A session were responsive?
How do you rate B&w on communicating information and business goals and objectives?
